Text: Next Wave of Energy TradingBODY bgColorffffff DIVFONT faceArial sizeEnergy Industry ProfessionalFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeGlobal Change Associates and the MYA Group announce the Green Trading Summit This is first conference attacking the triple convergence of the new markets of emissions renewables and negawatt trading in a risk management context The conference will be held in New York City on May at the McGrawHill Building in midtown Manhattan Topics include SO NOX and CO trading as well as renewable energy credit and negawatt energy efficiency trading Learn about how t o create environmental indexes for trading establishing the forward curve for environmental products applying environmental trading for project finance in this emerging commodity marketFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeSpeakers from Rocky Mountain Institute Greene Fannie Mae Sterling Planet Evolutions Markets EcoSecurities the Automated Power Exchange Duane Morris LLP Dow Jones the Demand Exchange and the Chicago Climate Exchange are participating at this ground breaking eventFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeFor further information click wwwglobalchangecomconferencehtml If you would like to deleted from this list please click and type remove We are sorry for any inconvenience FONTDIV

Energy Derivatives Bookpst Energy Industry Professional The book Energy Derivatives Trading Emerging Markets written by Peter Fusaro is now available from Global Change Associates at wwwglobalchangecom This book offers coverage of the emerging markets of emissions weat her coal bandwidth and electricity markets Expert contributors include Amerex Natsource Spectron NYMEX IPE Dow Jones and Arthur Andersen Further information is available on content and ordering on the Global Change Associates website under the book button If you would like to be deleted from this email list please click and type remove We are sorry for any inconvenience

Next Wave of Energy TradingBODY bgColorffffff DIVFONT faceArial sizeEnergy Industry ProfessionalFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeGlobal Change Associates and the MYA Group announce the Green Trading Summit This is first conference attacking the triple convergence of the new markets of emissions renewables and negawatt trading in a risk management context The conference will be held in New York City on May at the McGrawHill Building in midtown Manhattan Topics include SO NOX and CO trading as well as renewable energy credit and negawatt energy efficiency trading Learn about how t o create environmental indexes for trading establishing the forward curve for environmental products applying environmental trading for project finance in this emerging commodity marketFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeSpeakers from Rocky Mountain Institute Greene Fannie Mae Sterling Planet Evolutions Markets EcoSecurities the Automated Power Exchange Duane Morris LLP Dow Jones the Demand Exchange and the Chicago Climate Exchange are participating at this ground breaking eventFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizenbspFONTDIV DIVFONT faceArial sizeFor further information click wwwglobalchangecomconferencehtml If you would like to deleted from this list please click and type remove We are sorry for any inconvenience FONTDIV

Next Wave of Energy TradingEnergy Industry Professional Global Change Associates and the MYA Group announce the Green Trading Summit This is first conference attacking the triple convergence of the new markets of emissions renewables and negawatt trading in a risk management context The conference will be held in New York City on May at the McGrawHill Building in midtown Manhattan Topics include SO NOX and CO trading as well as renewable energy credit and negawatt energy efficiency trading Learn about how t o create environmental indexes for trading establishing the forward curve for environmental products applying environmental trading for project finance in this emerging commodity market Speakers from Rocky Mountain Institute Greene Fannie Mae Sterling Planet Evolutions Markets EcoSecurities the Automated Power Exchange Duane Morris LLP Dow Jones the Demand Exchange and the Chicago Climate Exchange are participating at this ground breaking event For further information click wwwglobalchangecomconferencehtml If you would like to deleted from this list please click and type remove We are sorry for any inconvenience
